Standard Featurizers for Statistical Machine Translation.

    Interface Description
    AlignmentFeaturizer
    An IncrementalFeaturizer implementing AlignmentFeaturizer expects Featurizable's t2fAlignmentIndex and f2tAlignmentIndex to be non-null.
